description: Add Inter font and Material Icons to aura-call page
steps: Add Google Fonts link for Inter (weights 300-700)
Add Material Icons Outlined link
Update font-family in component or global CSS
Verify fonts load in browser at localhost:5002
Test Material Icons render correctly

description: Add call mode toggle (Web Call / Phone Call) with pill UI
steps: Navigate to aura-call page at localhost:5002
Verify pill-style toggle renders with two buttons
Verify Web Call button shows mic icon, Phone Call shows call icon
Click toggle and verify active state switches
Verify proper styling: active=blue gradient, inactive=gray

description: Convert form layout to responsive grid (4 columns desktop, 1 mobile)
steps: Navigate to aura-call page
Verify form fields display in 4-column grid on desktop
Resize browser to mobile width, verify fields stack vertically
Verify consistent gap-4 spacing between fields
Verify all 4 fields (Location, Phone Type, Target Name, Resume) visible

description: Update form field styling with enhanced design system
steps: Navigate to aura-call page
Verify labels use uppercase tracking-wider styling
Verify inputs/selects use rounded-lg with proper backgrounds
Verify focus states show primary color ring
Test tab navigation and verify smooth transitions

description: Replace action button with gradient design and glow effect
steps: Navigate to aura-call page
Verify button shows blue-to-purple gradient
Verify power icon appears on left side
Verify text reads 'START A CONVERSATION' in uppercase
Hover over button and verify scale transform + glow effect

description: Add background blur effects (blue and purple gradients)
steps: Navigate to aura-call page
Verify blue blur effect visible in top-left background
Verify purple blur effect visible in bottom-right background
Verify blur effects don't interfere with content readability
Test in both light and dark mode if applicable

description: Implement call mode conditional logic (show/hide phone field)
steps: Navigate to aura-call page
Toggle to Web Call mode, verify phone number field hidden
Toggle to Phone Call mode, verify phone number field visible
Verify form submission adapts to selected mode
Test both modes submit with correct call type

description: E2E test: Complete UI with all design elements
steps: Navigate to aura-call page at localhost:5002
Verify complete design matches reference screenshot
Test all interactive elements (toggle, dropdowns, inputs, button)
Fill form and test web call with new UI
Verify parameters still flow correctly to agent
Take screenshot for design validation
